name: ConnectionSpotter
body:
### What is ConnectionSpotter?
ConnectionSpotter is a Firefox add-on that enhances the news reading experience by revealing hidden connections between people, corporations, and organizations. ConnectionSpotter builds on [Poligraft](http://poligraft.com/), [OpenSecrets](http://www.opensecrets.org/), and [LittleSis](http://www.littlesis.org/).

### Installation instructions
The instructions go here. Get firefox. Download it, unzip it, click on it, blah blah blah.

### How to use
Click on the eye in your add-on toolbar (lower left hand corner). Look at links. More detailed instructions to follow...

### Need Help?

### Disclaimer
The entities mentioned in the ConnectionSpotter sidebar are not necessarily the same people or organizations mentioned on the webpage you are viewing. Follow the hyperlinks in the sidebar to find out more detailed information about any piece of information. Take care when using the information provided. The chain data is provided by LittleSis, therefore you should also consider their [disclaimer](http://littlesis.org/disclaimer).
